amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to build flood protection walls for Interstate 5 between mile posts 72-82 in Lewis County, Washington.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Herrera Beutler amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A055) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
